state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to attempt to take a trip south. And then, go west. That done, make an effort to go to the north. Then, take a trip north. Then, travel east. With that accomplished, go south. And then, attempt to go to the west. After that, make an effort to take a trip north. Then, venture east. With that accomplished, take a trip south. With that done, take a trip east. After that, make an effort to head north. And then, travel north. With that done, move north. If you can do that, pick-up the coin from the floor of the laundry place. That's it! -= Dish-Pit =- You find yourself in a dish-pit. A normal one. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Dish-Pit =-0/1

-= Cubicle =- Of every cubicle you could have sauntered into, you had to show up in a typical one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Cubicle =-0/2

-= Washroom =- Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a washroom. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Washroom =-0/3
-= Kitchen =- Well, here we are in a kitchen. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. > -= Kitchen =-0/4

-= Shower =- You find yourself in a shower. A standard one. You begin to take stock of what's here. There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. > -= Shower =-0/5
-= Recreation Zone =- You've entered a recreation zone. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Recreation Zone =-0/6

-= Bedchamber =- You arrive in a bedchamber. A normal one. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Bedchamber =-0/7

-= Launderette =- You've just sauntered into a launderette. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Launderette =-0/8
-= Pantry =- You are in a pantry. An usual kind of place. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. > -= Pantry =-0/9

-= Studio =- You find yourself in a studio. A normal kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Studio =-0/10

-= Sauna =- You find yourself in a sauna. A standard kind of place. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north. > -= Sauna =-0/11

-= Cookhouse =- You are in a cookhouse. A standard one. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not? You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Cookhouse =-0/12

-= Workshop =- You find yourself in a workshop. You can barely contain your excitement. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Workshop =-0/13

-= Office =- You arrive in an office. An usual one. You begin looking for stuff. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Office =-0/14
-= Laundry Place =- This might come as a shock to you, but you've just come into a laundry place. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is a coin on the floor. > -= Laundry Place =-0/15
